General.Name: Jiangsu Chuanzhiboke Education Tech
General.Description: Jiangsu Chuanzhiboke Education Technology Co., LTD. offers employee-oriented vocational education services. It offers Courses for digital professionals, such as artificial intelligence, python and big data, JavaEE, HTML and JS + front-end, software testing, architects, intelligent robot software development, etc.; and digital application talent courses, including new media and short video live broadcast operation, product manager, and UI/UE and full-link designer. The company also provides consultation and human resource services; and engages in the radio and TV program production and consulting activities. The company was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.
